author: Cj Jones
comment: Excellent watchface, easily the best in the Playstore. Only wish I could switch photos more frequently than 30 min, but that's a minor quibble. The find my phone feature doesn't seem to work on my 360/Note4 but that's not a big deal to me either.  *edit* Find my phone is working now.

reply.author: Roberto Gil
reply.content: Thanks Cj for your feedback, I will include 30 minutes to switch photos in next release. Find phone feature  must be works in your notes and moto 360,  I have note3 and moto 360, after disconnecting, click in notification on your smartwatch, after appears one screen to click, but you must be move more close your  phone ,this screen will be change.

title: Cj Jones

author: Andrew Leverton
comment: Rubbish not worth the money. Does not shuffle photos on the watch and can't change my favorite telephone numbers. Need refund!
title: Levy

author: Sal A
comment: So far loving the app.   I purchased the Pro version, but at times the app doesn't recognize that.   Hopefully it'll correct itself with an update.
title: Great Watch Face Options

author: Sharon Isley
comment: I put in preferences that I do not want to see adult content, but I keep getting soft core porn pics available. I have changed the default category for the pictures, so this is no longer a problem. Thanks for answering, and for making a great app!

reply.author: Roberto Gil
reply.content: Sharon, i understand you, with adult disabled, only best 40 popular photos are displayed, this ranking is made by users, if 90% user are man, may be most popular photos include some pics with girls, i known, but I can not do anything, is a democratic vote. I sorry, again Sharon :(

title: Great!

author: cs k
comment: Liked it so much, this is the first time I've ever paid for a pro version of an app! Fast tech support. Very easy to add your own pics for the watch face. Love the one tap to bring up current appointments, steps and contacts.
title: Excellent

author: Rick Michaelson
comment: Mural Pro has all the features I've been looking for in a great watchface. 1) Choose of colors on the ambient display. 2) Add your own photos and choose duration between switching. 3) Multiple screens for different item. 4) Many useful features in the apps options (setup). 5) Developer responds to questions very quickly. Look over the features in the Playstore description, it's a winner!!

reply.author: Roberto Gil
reply.content: Thanks Rick for your feedback, you are wellcome

author: Madhav Desabhotla
comment: I bought the pro. There is a sync problem. The watch face shown wrong time(20 minutes behind the phone) until a minute or half a minute after sync'ing with the phone corrects itself.
title: Wrong time

author: Jonathan Knowles
comment: Amazing app exactly what I wanted for changing images , the only thing missing for me is the ability for bigger digits on standby and the ability to change the location of the digits/ date to a custom location

author: Gary Parizek
comment: I have an LG 2nd edition LTE, The icons on a watch face are not on Center around the circumference of the watch face this need to be fixed if fixed I will give it 5 stars if that matters.
title: Center ring

author: Matthew Bolwyn
comment: I grab wallpapers for my watch daily from this awesome app 10/10!!!! And it gets constant updates which adds new features and fixes layout issues. This is the only one out of the dozens of watch apps I constantly use.
title: Super awesome!

author: Jed Dye
comment: Why do you need permission to read confidential data and make calls without my consent? You don't need half the permissions you're asking. Much more permissions asked than any other watchface. DO NOT INSTALL

author: Brad Mosburg
comment: Vibrates every few minutes unless you buy the pro version. Only one personal photo allowed in the free version so you can't really try it
title: Nag ware

author: Dorinda Pyle
comment: Could not get it to work on my Gear S2. Wish it would because it has some beautiful pics.
title: Would not work!

author: James Stephan-Usypchuk
comment: Been waiting over an hour and even after buying the paid version it still doesn't upload new screens I've selected to my watch.
title: Doesn't work

author: David Struff.
comment: Would have been nice to choose a picture and customize the watchface so I could fully experience it. But I'm not going to pay just to try it

author: Jesse Kramasz
comment: Previous feedback was due to not being able to modify settings on watch. I guess through the app is fair enough. Happy with the app.
title: Nice watch face.

comment: Tried countless apps and finally found this one and it really takes advantage of my watch screen !
title: High def

comment: I wan't to give this app 0 * because from one hour the app is taking to connect only but still isn't connect

comment: App tells me that there is no weather info. Not sure how to fix it

comment: Ugliest watch I've ever seen. Even the free lead in is terrible.

comment: Its awesome. U can choose any pic and those pics are really awesome and attractive

comment: Been great but recently it has not been working and it displays no photos on the ap

comment: Super app.  Am paid member and completely satisfied..  Not changed to any other watch face till date..
title: Awesome

comment: Love that I can customize my watchface. I can use my photos, thank you! Has all the features I look for. Great app!!

comment: Very nice.  Can't figure out how to get the photos to shuffle.

comment: It would Never Connect to my Gear S2 Watch !!!
